name: Asia Conference on Knowledge and Innovation Management
content: For papers submitted to ACKIM 2020, we offer the publications as following: 1\. Publication in Proceedings. Accepted papers after undergoing a preliminary review and rigorous peer review will be published in Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, etc. 2\. Publication in Journal. Selected papers will be published in the International Journal of Innovation, Management and Technology, which will be indexed by Google Scholar, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Crossref, ProQuest, etc.
